description:
I installed Ubuntu 11.10 desktop on a VM. This VM has DHCP IP. Then installed devstack
Then i ran the nova tests available in /opt/stack/nova

 ./run_tests.sh -N

I hit the following error


======================================================================
ERROR: test_block_external_addresses_validate_output_for_invalid_input (nova.tests.api.ec2.test_admin.AdminControllerTestCase)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/tests/api/ec2/test_admin.py", line 374, in test_block_external_addresses_validate_output_for_invalid_input
    result = self._ac.block_external_addresses(self._c, '12.10.10.256/24')
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/api/ec2/admin.py", line 353, in block_external_addresses
    if not utils.is_valid_cidr(cidr):
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/utils.py", line 1032, in is_valid_cidr
    netaddr.IPNetwork(address)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/netaddr/ip/__init__.py", line 919, in __init__
    implicit_prefix, flags)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/netaddr/ip/__init__.py", line 782, in parse_ip_network
    value = ip._value
UnboundLocalError: local variable 'ip' referenced before assignment
-------------------- >> begin captured logging << --------------------
2012-02-01 06:47:33,139 AUDIT nova.api.ec2.admin [req-e2fb4ec0-8532-432e-9945-7b8945ad61c0 None None] Blocking traffic to all projects incoming from 12.10.10.256/24
--------------------- >> end captured logging << ---------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 2627 tests in 520.185s

FAILED (SKIP=11, errors=1)
Slowest 5 tests took 35.34 secs:
    10.05      test_create_and_rebuild_server (nova.tests.integrated.test_servers.ServersTest)
    6.51       test_instance_initiated_shutdown_behavior (nova.tests.api.ec2.test_cloud.CloudTestCase)
    6.36       test_create_multiple_servers (nova.tests.integrated.test_servers.ServersTest)
    6.29       test_deferred_delete_force (nova.tests.integrated.test_servers.ServersTest)
    6.14       test_deferred_delete (nova.tests.integrated.test_servers.ServersTest)
title: Test case test_block_external_addresses_validate_output_for_invalid_input fails on devstack installation

comments.content:
I installed Ubuntu 11.10 desktop on a VM. This VM has DHCP IP. Then installed devstack
Then i ran the nova tests available in /opt/stack/nova

 ./run_tests.sh -N

I hit the following error


======================================================================
ERROR: test_block_external_addresses_validate_output_for_invalid_input (nova.tests.api.ec2.test_admin.AdminControllerTestCase)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/tests/api/ec2/test_admin.py", line 374, in test_block_external_addresses_validate_output_for_invalid_input
    result = self._ac.block_external_addresses(self._c, '12.10.10.256/24')
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/api/ec2/admin.py", line 353, in block_external_addresses
    if not utils.is_valid_cidr(cidr):
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/utils.py", line 1032, in is_valid_cidr
    netaddr.IPNetwork(address)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/netaddr/ip/__init__.py", line 919, in __init__
    implicit_prefix, flags)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/netaddr/ip/__init__.py", line 782, in parse_ip_network
    value = ip._value
UnboundLocalError: local variable 'ip' referenced before assignment
-------------------- >> begin captured logging << --------------------
2012-02-01 06:47:33,139 AUDIT nova.api.ec2.admin [req-e2fb4ec0-8532-432e-9945-7b8945ad61c0 None None] Blocking traffic to all projects incoming from 12.10.10.256/24
--------------------- >> end captured logging << ---------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 2627 tests in 520.185s

FAILED (SKIP=11, errors=1)
Slowest 5 tests took 35.34 secs:
    10.05      test_create_and_rebuild_server (nova.tests.integrated.test_servers.ServersTest)
    6.51       test_instance_initiated_shutdown_behavior (nova.tests.api.ec2.test_cloud.CloudTestCase)
    6.36       test_create_multiple_servers (nova.tests.integrated.test_servers.ServersTest)
    6.29       test_deferred_delete_force (nova.tests.integrated.test_servers.ServersTest)
    6.14       test_deferred_delete (nova.tests.integrated.test_servers.ServersTest)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sagar-r-nikam

comments.content: This code was removed recently, but it appears to be an error in netaddr.  It should be raising there
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
